text:
Cameron Wayne Smith (born 18 June 1983) is an Australian professional rugby league player. Since 2002, he has played for the Melbourne Storm in the National Rugby League (NRL). He plays as a hooker and is also a goal-kicker. He won the 2012 and 2017 NRL premierships with the Storm. Smith has played the most games and is the highest all-time points scorer in NRL history. He represented Queensland and Australia until 2017.
Smith was born in Logan, Queensland. He attended Marsden State High School. He is married to Barbara Johnson and has three children.
